dict.acceptation: 蠢的；糊涂的；不明事理的；没头脑的；
（常用于向孩子指出其愚蠢行为）傻孩子，淘气鬼；傻子，蠢货；

sent.orig: Silly things people ask silly, silly man A silly question, is boring people?
sent.trans: 无聊之人问无聊之事，无聊之人答无聊之问，都是无聊的人？

sent.orig: Ask a silly question and you'll get a silly answer.
sent.trans: 问笨问题就会得到傻答案。

sent.orig: Very silly is very silly was persisting.
If silly Sally will shilly-shally, shall silly Willy-nilly Shilly-shally, too?
sent.trans: 如果愚蠢的萨莉犹豫不决，愚蠢的威利也将不容分辩的犹豫不决？

sent.orig: Give a silly answer to a silly question.
sent.trans: 要用愚蠢的话回答愚蠢人。
